name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Steel Helmet
description: A sturdy helmet made of steel
looks: The helmet is made of smooth steel with a silver tint. It has a visor that can be opened and closed.

name: Iron Plate Armor
description: A sturdy armor made from iron plates
looks: The armor is made up of overlapping iron plates, covering the entire torso and extending down to the thighs. It also has shoulder and elbow guards.

name: Cloak of the Arcane
description: A lightweight robe woven with intricate enchantments, designed to enhance the wearer's magical abilities.
looks: The Cloak of the Arcane has a deep purple color, with shimmering silver threads embedded in the fabric. It has a hood and intricate patterns of arcane symbols embroidered along the edges.

name: Shadowcloth Robe
description: A lightweight robe made from enchanted shadowcloth. It provides excellent protection against magical attacks while allowing for agile movements.
looks: The Shadowcloth Robe is a long, flowing black garment that shimmers with faint magical energy. It has a high collar and intricate silver embroidery along the edges.

special_effects.stealth: Grants a bonus to Stealth skill when worn.

name: Mage Robe
description: A flowing robe made for mages, providing comfort and freedom of movement.
looks: The robe is made of a lightweight and breathable fabric, adorned with intricate patterns and symbols that shimmer with magical energy.

name: Silk Robe
description: A lightweight and comfortable robe made from the finest silk.
looks: The silk robe has a flowing design, with intricate patterns woven into the fabric.

name: Silk Robe
description: A light and flowing robe made from the finest silk fabric.
looks: The Silk Robe is ankle-length and features loose sleeves. It is decorated with intricate embroidery of magical symbols.

name: Leather Tunic
description: A lightweight tunic made of soft leather.
looks: The leather tunic is a simple piece of armor that covers the torso. It has a round neckline and short sleeves.

name: Leather Chestpiece
description: A light and flexible chestpiece made from high-quality leather.
looks: The leather chestpiece is a sleeveless vest that covers the chest and upper torso. It is made from brown leather with reinforced stitching and adjustable buckle straps for a secure fit.

name: Leather Vest
description: A lightweight vest made of high-quality leather.
looks: The leather vest has a slim and form-fitting design, providing both protection and ease of movement. It is dyed a dark brown color and has intricate stitching along the edges.
